questions.question: Confirm the Equipment with the image placed below.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again.
confirm is there any physical Damage of the Equipment.
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing Report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230.
shift the Equipment to another place where the AC voltage of 230 is provided
check the power cord continuity as shown in the video and confirm whether the power cord is defective.
then replace the power cord with the new one
open the equipment, check the continuity of Power Switch and confirm whether the switch is defective.
replace the switch with a new one
replace the motor with a new one
Confirm the Power / Suction pilot lamp appears when equipment is switched ON.
replace the pilot lamp with a new one
Check and confirm whether sufficient pressure / pressure is delivered.
check and confirm whether there is any breakage, cracks, Loosens and debris formation in the tubing.
replace the tubing with a new one
check and confirm whether the jars / canister for any breakage, cracks / Damage.
replace the jars / canister with a new one
check and confirm whether the suction port filter for any obstructions and debris formation.
replace the filter with a new one
open the front panel, check and confirm for any loose connections, filter port obstructions or disconnections.
connect them accordingly
check and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON but there is no suction with a motor sound.
kindly replace the motor with a new one
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
